title: French Fry Festival
post_excerpt: Whatâ€™s a vacation without a little indulging? French fry indulging that is....
post_content:
What’s a vacation without a little indulging? French fry indulging that is. Join the Gulf to Bay Food Truck Association as they host the first annual St. Pete Fresh Fry Festival. More than ten food trucks will line up and serve specialty fries in conjunction with their normal cuisine. Listen to good ol' Americana music with live a musical performance by Glass Half Full. Some of the food trucks serving unique takes on the fried potato are Hot Rod Wings, Surf and Turf Truck, The Boom Boom Box, Cajun in a Truck, Vanchetta Food Truck, 'Merica Food Truck, and more.

Location: Marine Discovery Center, 250 8th Ave SE, Port St. Pete

Time: 6-9 p.m.
